data_maturity_level.evidence: Matches score of 2 - basic pipelines with some cloud migration but lacks modern practices

overtime_risk_score.evidence: Onsite work model in delivery center suggests potential for client-driven deadlines; no work-life balance signals mentioned

role_clarity.evidence: Well-defined responsibilities around data gathering, storage, ETL, and integration with specific tool requirements

reporting_structure.evidence: No reporting structure specified in job description

tech_culture_score.evidence: Legacy tooling (Informatica PowerCenter) with some cloud migration; no modern engineering practices (CI/CD, testing, code review) mentioned

dev_practices_mentioned.evidence: No development practices (code review, CI/CD, monitoring, etc.) mentioned in job description

ml_tools_expected.evidence: No ML tools mentioned in required or preferred skills

hiring_urgency.evidence: No urgency indicators (ASAP, immediate start, etc.) in job description

competition_level.evidence: IBM brand attracts candidates; location in India with onsite requirement may limit pool but still competitive for local talent

company_stage_inferred.evidence: IBM is a well-established enterprise technology company with global delivery centers

hiring_velocity.evidence: IBM regularly hires for delivery centers; no indication of aggressive expansion or replacement hiring

team_size_signals.evidence: IBM Consulting Client Innovation Centers typically have large teams; no specific size mentioned but implies substantial delivery organization

funding_stage_signals.evidence: IBM is a publicly traded company with stable funding

strength_details: Established enterprise company (IBM) with global delivery centers
Clear data engineering focus with specific ETL and integration responsibilities
Cloud migration experience (Azure) is a valuable skill for modernization projects
concern_details: Heavy reliance on legacy ETL tool (Informatica PowerCenter) with no modern data stack
Onsite work in Navi Mumbai required - relocation needed for non-local candidates
No clear career progression or learning opportunities mentioned
No visa sponsorship indicated - limited to candidates with Indian work authorization
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers with 3-5 years experience in ETL and data warehousing
Candidates with Informatica PowerCenter experience and cloud migration skills
Engineers comfortable with enterprise environments and legacy systems
probe_details: Ask about actual team size and seniority mix in the delivery center
Inquire about opportunities for skill development and career progression
Clarify the specific cloud technologies and modernization roadmap
Understand typical work hours and client delivery expectations
leverage_details: Strong Informatica PowerCenter experience is a key differentiator for this role
Cloud migration experience (Azure) is valuable for IBM's modernization initiatives
summary.overall_assessment: Solid opportunity for mid-level data engineers seeking enterprise experience with IBM. Clear role focused on ETL and data integration with cloud migration exposure. Main drawbacks are legacy technology stack, onsite requirement in India, and limited growth path visibility. Best for candidates with Informatica experience looking for stable enterprise roles.
